queries.login: select u.id, u._password, r.role_id from user_details as u inner join role_mapping as r where u.id={0} and u.id=r.user_id
queries.show_details: select u.*, d.*, vd.name from user_details as u inner join dose_info_mapping as dm on u.id=dm.user_id inner join dose_details as d on dm.dose_id=d.id inner join vaccine_details as vd on dm.vaccine_id=vd.id where u.id="{0}"
queries.add_user: insert into user_details(id, user_name, dob, contact, gender, _password) values("{0}", "{1}", "{2}", "{3}", "{4}", "{5}")
queries.update_user: update user_details set user_name = "{0}" , dob = "{1}" , contact = "{2}" , gender = "{3}" , _password = "{4}"
queries.search_user: select * from user_details where id="{0}" or user_name="{0}"
queries.enter_dose_info: insert into dose_details(id , date , dose_type) values("{0}" , "{1}" , "{2}" )
queries.dose_info_mapping: insert into dose_info_mapping(user_id , dose_id , vaccine_id) values( "{0}" , "{1}" , "{2}" )
